answer: DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT FOR PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE IS '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_NAME is 'A' DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_PLAN_UOM is 'D' prorationFactor = 1 return prorationFactor

DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_NAME is 'A' DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_PLAN_UOM is 'D' DEFAULT for IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) Inputs are IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE(date) x=0 y=0 z=0 l_no_of_days=DAYS_BETWEEN(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)),PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE) l_length_of_service=(l_no_of_days) hire_year_number = to_num(to_char(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE, 'yyyy')) Termination_year_number = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'yyyy')) current_year_number = to_num(to_char(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)), 'yyyy')) hire_month_no= to_num(to_char(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE, 'mm')) Termination_month_no= to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'mm')) current_month_no = to_num(to_char(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)), 'mm')) no_of_days_month = to_num(to_char(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE, 'dd')) no_of_days_month1 = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'dd')) Last_date_Hire_month = LAST_DAY(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE) Last_date_terminate_month = LAST_DAY(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE) Las_day_Hire = to_num(to_char(Last_date_Hire_month, 'dd')) Last_day_terminate_month = to_num(to_char(Last_date_terminate_month, 'dd')) last_date_of_year = to_date('31/12'||'/'||to_char(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE, 'yyyy'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') if(hire_year_number = current_year_number) then ( Days = DAYS_BETWEEN(last_date_of_year,IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE)+1 prorationFactor = Days/365 ) else ( prorationFactor = 1.0 ) prorationFactor = ROUND(prorationFactor,2) return prorationFactor

FORMULA_NAME: Kaneka Annual Leave Monthly Proration FF
answer: DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_NAME is 'A' DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_PLAN_UOM is 'D' Inputs are IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE(date) x=0 y=0 z=0 prorationFactor = 1 l_no_of_days=DAYS_BETWEEN(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)),PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE) l_length_of_service=(l_no_of_days) hire_year_number = to_num(to_char(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE, 'yyyy')) Termination_year_number = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'yyyy')) current_year_number = to_num(to_char(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)), 'yyyy')) hire_enroll_month_no= to_num(to_char(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE, 'mm')) Termination_month_no= to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'mm')) current_month_no = to_num(to_char(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)), 'mm')) no_of_days_month = to_num(to_char(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE, 'dd')) no_of_days_month1 = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'dd')) Last_date_Hire_month = LAST_DAY(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE) Last_date_terminate_month = LAST_DAY(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE) Last_day_Hire = to_num(to_char(Last_date_Hire_month, 'dd')) hire_date = IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE Last_day_terminate_month = to_num(to_char(Last_date_terminate_month, 'dd')) last_date_of_year = to_date('31/12'||'/'||to_char(IV_PLANENROLLMENTSTARTDATE, 'yyyy'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') if((hire_year_number = current_year_number) AND (hire_enroll_month_no = current_month_no)) then ( Last_date_HireMonth = to_date(to_char(hire_year_number) || '/' || to_char(current_month_no) || '/' || to_char(Last_day_Hire),'yyyy/mm/dd') Days = DAYS_BETWEEN(Last_date_HireMonth,hire_date)+1 prorationFactor = Days/Last_day_Hire ) else if((hire_year_number <> current_year_number) AND (hire_enroll_month_no = current_month_no))then ( prorationFactor = (no_of_days_month-1)/Last_day_Hire ) else ( prorationFactor = 1.0 ) prorationFactor = ABS(ROUND(prorationFactor,2)) l_log = ESS_LOG_WRITE('prorationFactor---' || to_char(prorationFactor)) l_log = ESS_LOG_WRITE('no_of_days_month---' || to_char(no_of_days_month)) l_log = ESS_LOG_WRITE('Last_day_Hire---' || to_char(Last_day_Hire)) return prorationFactor

DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_NAME is 'A' DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_PLAN_UOM is 'D' l_no_of_days=DAYS_BETWEEN(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)),PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE) l_length_of_service=(l_no_of_days) l_days_in_year_hire = 0 l_term_days_in_year = 0 hire_year_number = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE, 'yyyy')) current_year_number = to_num(to_char(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)), 'yyyy')) hire_month_no= to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE, 'mm')) current_month_no = to_num(to_char(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)), 'mm')) no_of_days_month = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE, 'dd')) no_of_term_days_month = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE, 'dd')) current_year_First = to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE,'yyyy') || '/04/01' L_WORKING_START_DATE = '0001/01/01 00:00:00' (Date) l_current_year_working_days = 0 l_length_of_TERM_DAYS=0 l_debug = ess_log_write('effective_date= '+ to_char(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)), 'dd-mon-yyyy')) l_debug = ess_log_write('PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE= '+ to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE, 'dd-mon-yyyy')) l_debug = ess_log_write('effective_date= '+ to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'dd-mon-yyyy')) l_debug = ess_log_write('effective_date= '+ to_char(trunc(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)),'yyyy'), 'dd-mon-yyyy')) term_year_number = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'yyyy')) term_month_no= to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'mm')) no_termination_days = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'dd')) IF PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE > trunc(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)),'yyyy') THEN ( L_WORKING_START_DATE =PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE ) ELSE ( L_WORKING_START_DATE =trunc(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)),'yyyy') ) l_days_in_year_hire = DAYS_BETWEEN(add_months(last_day(trunc(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE,'yyyy')),11),PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE)+1 l_term_days_in_year= DAYS_BETWEEN(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE,L_WORKING_START_DATE)+1 l_current_year_working_days = DAYS_BETWEEN(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE,PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE)+1 l_length_of_TERM_DAYS=((l_current_year_working_days/365)*12) if (ANC_ABS_PLN_NAME='Annual Leave') then( if( TO_DATE('01/04'||'/'||to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE,'YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') < (PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE)) THEN( NUmber_of_days=DAYS_BETWEEN(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE,TO_DATE('01/04'||'/'||to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE,'YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY')) Eligilble_days=365-NUmber_of_days prorationFactor = (Eligilble_days)/365 ) else if(term_year_number = current_year_number) AND (term_month_no = current_month_no) and (hire_year_number <> term_year_number) then ( prorationFactor = (l_term_days_in_year)/365 ) else ( prorationFactor = 1.0 ) ) return prorationFactor

DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT FOR PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE IS '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_NAME is 'A' DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_PLAN_UOM is 'D' prorationFactor = 1 return prorationFactor

DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE is '4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date) DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_NAME is 'A' DEFAULT for ANC_ABS_PLN_PLAN_UOM is 'D' l_no_of_days=DAYS_BETWEEN(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)),PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE) l_length_of_service=(l_no_of_days) hire_year_number = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE, 'yyyy')) Termination_year_number = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'yyyy')) current_year_number = to_num(to_char(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)), 'yyyy')) hire_month_no= to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE, 'mm')) Termination_month_no= to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'mm')) current_month_no = to_num(to_char(GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)), 'mm')) no_of_days_month = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE, 'dd')) no_of_days_month1 = to_num(to_char(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'dd')) Last_date_Hire_month = LAST_DAY(PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE) Last_date_terminate_month = LAST_DAY(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE) Las_day_Hire = to_num(to_char(Last_date_Hire_month, 'dd')) Last_day_terminate_month = to_num(to_char(Last_date_terminate_month, 'dd')) if (ANC_ABS_PLN_NAME='Annual Leave Plan') then( if(hire_year_number = current_year_number AND hire_month_no = current_month_no) then ( Days = DAYS_BETWEEN(Last_date_Hire_month,PER_ASG_REL_ORIGINAL_DATE_OF_HIRE)+1 prorationFactor = Days/Las_day_Hire ) Else if(Termination_year_number = current_year_number AND Termination_month_no = current_month_no) Then ( First_date_of_terminate_month = TRUNC(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, 'MONTH') Days = DAYS_BETWEEN(PER_ASG_REL_ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE,First_date_of_terminate_month)+1 prorationFactor = Days/Last_day_terminate_month ) else ( prorationFactor = 1.0 ) ) return prorationFactor
DEFAULT FOR PER_ASG_JOB_NAME IS ' ' prorationFactor = 1 RETURN prorationFactor
